products.title: Unicolour Fr Cream 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Introduce elegant nuetral tones with their unicolour fr cream made to measure vertical blind. Light filtering & resistent to moisture. Their stunning unicolour range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options. products.title: Raffia Blackout Linen Roller Blind
products.description: With its delicious neutral shade and a beautiful woven texture, this versatile roller blind positively radiates warmth and cosiness. The practical, performance fabric is reliable and robust, but moreover is gorgeously creamy and stylish. It's a versatile shade too, the kind with its delicious neutral shade and a beautiful woven texture, this versatile roller blind positively radiates warmth and cosiness.

products.title: Moda Blackout Cream Roller Blind
products.description: A creamy delight, this moda roller blind is abundant in softness, delicacy and warmth. The lovely off-white tones will help your home feel open and bright. It has a textured finish to give it a drop of designer style and is perfect for pairing with most colour schemes. Light, dar a creamy delight, this moda roller blind is abundant in softness, delicacy and warmth.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Blizzard Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Build a stunning window arrangement that's both stylish and practical with the ecowood deluxe in blizzard grey fine grain. This sleek collection of quality louvres creates a contemporary venetian blind made from convincing faux wood that's both moisture-resistant and has the ability to be adapted to any surrounding. Craft a chic ambience in your bedroom by hanging the blizzard grey fine grain amidst pastel pink walls and bedlinen.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The designer look of the ecowood deluxe range simply cannot be beaten, and the pale cream chenille fine grain adds a new level of sophistication to the collection. Its classic look belies its hardwearing formula, as it is made from high quality, wood-look pvc for durability and water-resistance. Complement a classic brown and cream colour scheme by surrounding the chenille fine grain with chocolate browns, delicate taupes, and light oatmeals.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Pistachio Shell Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: When it comes to neutrals, there's no beating the soft grey-toned beige of the pistachio shell satin. Hailing from the ecowood deluxe range, this blind comes complete with linen backing ribbon and matching coordinates for a sleek and streamline look. Tone down a rich red feature wall in your living room or dining room by adding the pistachio shell satin to the scheme. Accent with accessories and ornaments in matching cream tones and the occasional splash of red here and there.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Devon Cream Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: For an enchanting window arrangement, choose the ecowood deluxe in devon cream satin for its hardwearing faux wood and quality craftsmanship. This popular choice, with matching supports and decorative, designer detailing, generates a contemporary, venetian-style blind with quick and easy installation and valuable moisture-resistance. Generate a sophisticated restroom with peaceful shading by hanging the devon cream satin against a contemporary, dove grey surrounding.

products.title: Amor Pearl Roller Blind
products.description: The amor pearl roller blind has a touch of cream to it, making this a very versatile colour. This is the perfect blind for people who don't want the bright white of some blinds, but like the crisp effect, white gives a room. Additionally, the amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms, kitchens and living rooms. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light.

products.title: Harewood Blackout Cream Vertical Blind
products.description: Our harewood blackout is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With the added benefit of its colour matched blackout backing and attractive prices harewood blackout is one of their bestselling blackout ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it. The high-quality harewood blackout blind is now available from 13.

products.description: Their alessi range is a great purchase for a room, the very affordable polyester vertical blinds come in an array of vibrant colours. products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Driftwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With its ash-like looks and grainy texture, the ecowood deluxe in driftwood fine grain has the authentic look and feel of real wood. The faux wood it's made of is high quality, moisture-resistant, and forms sleek, attractive slats, venetian style. Because wood goes with anything, the driftwood fine grain is one of the most versatile blinds around when it comes to looks. Use it with similarly toned woods in a light and airy kitchen, throwing in your favourite colour as an accent.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Almond - Roller Blind
products.description: Include the sophisticated roma (fr) in almond within your home or commercial surrounding as an elegant addition with beneficial, practical elements. The modern rolling mechanism with its simple pull-cord creates a contemporary look, and the blind is formed with flame-retardant fabric to suit any surrounding. Forge a soothing and serene space by hanging the almond with a blend of neutral and wholesome tones, such as biscuit, ivory, and mocha.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The ajanta (blackout) in cream features an off-white abstract patterning on a barely-there, almost gold cream that shimmers gently as the light hits it. It will only be your indoors light that gets to it though, as this powerful blackout blind is every bit as effective as you'd hope at keeping outside light disturbances out. Team with rich creams and the subtlest of golds in a modern, luxurious kitchen, for which the wipe-clean fabric makes it perfect.

products.title: Crystalline Voile, Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Cream focuses on celebrating the interplay between ambient light and finely woven fabric. The subtle variations in thickness and spacing of the mesh give the fabric a life of its own that provides an extra layer of depth for your eye to explore. Use cream where you want to break up a simple monotone surface by adding a little bit of texture that won't come to the fore in the same way that an eye-catching floral pattern would.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in cream is a dark, dusky shade of cream, that isn't too far from magnolia. It's the perfect neutral, and what's more, it's hardy, wipe-clean, and simple to use. The high quality material and rolling mechanism of the palermo mean this blackout blind will last, year after year. Couple this rich hue with dark browns and paler creams in a warm, traditional kitchen, or use in the playroom amongst bolder, more playful colours.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Country Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Gently textured to imitate genuine wood, the ecowood deluxe in country fine grain gives a quality impression of the real thing. All this despite being made from faux wood pvc, which makes it hardwearing and water-resistant. Do as it says on the tin and use the country fine grain as part of a rural, country theme in the kitchen. Opt for rustic shades of terracotta, sage green, and sky blue for the tiling, and choose units in a similar light wood.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: Mix practicality with style by featuring the quality origin (blackout) in oyster grey within your home. Being a quality blackout blind, this blind can help you and your family to get the best night's sleep possible by blocking out the night-time light and summertime sun. Complement the delectable oyster grey with a harmonising combination of coffee and cream tones to produce a warm and welcoming room full of soothing colour.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chateau Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Plump for all-out vintage style with the ecowood deluxe range's chateau fine grain, a beautifully stained, faux wood blind offering all of the flair and functionality of a venetian. The design is formed from top quality elements, with heavy duty headrails to ensure total security. Bring some authentic french styling to the master bedroom, surrounding the chateau fine grain with varying shades of cream and ivory.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Espresso Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Featuring a dark brown colouring and authentic-looking wood grain, the ecowood deluxe's espresso fine grain is an attractive luxury blind. Designer-style woven ladder tapes finish off this handsome look with streamlined chic. Team the brown of the espresso fine grain with a muted terracotta for an unusual yet striking look in a contemporary living room. Go for white walls, adorning them with funky wall prints in matching blacks and burnt oranges.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Provincial Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: It would be simple to create an elegant dcor with the ecowood deluxe in provincial fine grain, due to its natural, honeyed tone and authentic appearance. The hardwearing and water-resistant faux wood used to form this practical, venetian-style blind produces a pleasant window dressing that is full of hidden benefits. Showcase the provincial fine grain in your lounge with sun-kissed, lumber flooring and toned furnishings to fashion a coordinated arrangement with authentic features.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Fruitwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Create an authentic window dressing that is long-lasting and water-resistant with the ecowood deluxe in fruitwood fine grain. This quality faux wood prevents both warping and cracking with its durable pvc that looks and feels just like the real thing. It also features top quality components for a contemporary, modern edge, and decorative linen tapes for added designer detail. Craft a well-dressed dcor in the kitchen by including the fruitwood fine grain with walnut cabinets and coordinating lumber worktops.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Magnolia - Roller Blind
products.description: Pale and neutral, the origin (blackout) in magnolia brings out the best in all colours, and sits on a soft, smooth fabric. As well as being fine and malleable, this blind is a powerful blackout fabric that is durable and will last year upon year. The magnolia will complement almost any shade, and can be used as a central feature in a brown or neutral colour scheme in a bedroom or living room. Or instead, set it amongst greens or blues for a refreshing, calming look in the bathroom.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Spun Pearl - Roller Blind
products.description: The elegant neutrality of the origin (blackout)'s spun pearl brings warmth and sophistication wherever it's used. This taupe coloured blind is made from sturdy, high quality fabric that offers the latest in blackout technology, making it the perfect choice for keeping out harmful uv rays. The spun pearl will add style and grace to a cream and gold dcor scheme in a classic yet contemporary living room or bedroom.
